title: What are the natural rights of philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Prereqs: Survival, Military, Economics. Rights: To have an intellectual mode.With experience, to have consciousness.With more experience, to be paradigmatic.With more experience, to live in a Golden Age.With more experience, to gain some form of metaphysical transcendence.That's a very abbreviated form. Mythological view: The rights of the immortals are something like Health, Wealth, Happiness, and Magic-if-you-are-smart-enough. And they tend to have Wisdom to begin with. Intelligence is the measure of all things. Magic is a broken measure.
